list.title: Identifiers
list.description: Enum for different identifiers fr different pages

list.title: generateAcronym
list.description: Generates an acronym from a description.

list.title: handleFileRecord
list.description: Handles file record management in the database. Creates a new file record if it doesn't exist, or updates an existing one.

list.title: insertRegionsAndGetIds
list.description: Inserts new regions into the region_name table and returns a mapping of region names to their IDs.

list.title: module:nifti_viewer.load_untouch0_nii_hdr
list.description:
Loads the header of a NIfTI file.

This function initializes a FILE object to read the binary data of a NIfTI header. It then extracts the header information and returns it. This function does not read anything regarding the transformation.

list.title: module:nifti_viewer.load_untouch_nii
list.description: Load a NIfTI or ANALYZE dataset without applying affine transformations or voxel intensity scaling. This function preserves the original NIfTI header and data untouched.

list.title: module:nifti_viewer.load_untouch_nii_hdr
list.description:
Loads the header of a NIfTI file.

This function initializes a FILE object to read the binary data of a NIfTI header. It then extracts the header information and returns it. If the magic field in the header is not 'n+1' or 'ni1', qform_code and sform_code are set to 0.

list.title: module:nifti_viewer.nifti_anatomical_convention
list.description: Automatically flips NIFTI image data to have the right side on the right. Only works on 3D black-and-white NIfTI images. It does not work on colored images, images with imaginary numbers, or 4D images.

list.title: module:nifti_viewer.xform_nii
list.description: Transforms a NIfTI (nii) image based on its header information. This function applies scaling, rotation, and flipping transformations according to the sform and qform matrices while considering the preferred transformation form and a given tolerance.

list.title: module:nifti_viewer/matlab_functions.bitset
list.description: Set bit at specific location

list.title: module:nifti_viewer/matlab_functions.det
list.description: Matrix determinant

list.title: module:nifti_viewer/matlab_functions.diag
list.description: Create diagonal matrix or get diagonal elements of matrix

list.title: module:nifti_viewer/matlab_functions.find
list.description: Find indices and values of nonzero elements

list.title: module:nifti_viewer/matlab_functions.flip
list.description: Flip order of elements CAUTION: This function modifies the original array.

list.title: module:nifti_viewer/matlab_functions.inv
list.description: Matrix inverse

list.title: module:nifti_viewer/matlab_functions.isequal
list.description: Determine array equality

list.title: module:nifti_viewer/matlab_functions.isnumeric
list.description: Determine whether input is numeric array

list.title: module:nifti_viewer/matlab_functions.ndims
list.description: Number of array dimensions

list.title: module:nifti_viewer/matlab_functions.permute
list.description: Permute array dimentions

list.title: module:nifti_viewer/matlab_functions.prod
list.description: Product of array elements

list.title: module:nifti_viewer/matlab_functions.reshape
list.description: Reshape array by rearranging existing elements

list.title: module:nifti_viewer/matlab_functions.size
list.description: Array size

list.title: module:nifti_viewer/matlab_functions.sub2ind
list.description: Convert subscripts to linear indices

list.title: module:nifti_viewer/matlab_functions.transpose
list.description: Transpose vector or matrix

list.title: module:nifti_viewer/matlab_functions.unique
list.description: Given an array, return an array that does not contain any duplicates Only tested with single dimensional array

list.title: module:nifti_viewer~FILE#fclose
list.description: Closes the file, clearing the content buffer and resetting the offset.

list.title: module:nifti_viewer~FILE#fopen
list.description: Opens a data source and initializes the content buffer.

list.title: module:nifti_viewer~FILE#fread
list.description: Reads data from the file at the current offset.

list.title: module:nifti_viewer~FILE#frewind
list.description: Resets the file pointer to the beginning of the file.

list.title: module:nifti_viewer~FILE#fseek
list.description: Changes the current read/write position in the file.

list.title: module:nifti_viewer~FILE#ftell
list.description: Gets the current offset within the file.

list.description: Parses stimulation CSV data into a data structure format.
